title: note.add Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing information about the added Note.

total.description: The total number of Notes in the Notefile.

template.description: `true` when a template is active on the Notefile.

note.description: The ID of the added note. Only returned when adding to database files (`.db/.dbs/.dbx`) with `note` parameter set to "?" for auto-generated IDs.

samples.title: Basic Add Response
samples.description: Response showing total notes after adding to a Notefile.

samples.title: Add Response with Template Active
samples.description: Response when adding to a templated Notefile.

samples.title: Database Add Response with Generated ID
samples.description: Response when adding to database with auto-generated note ID.

samples.title: Empty Response
samples.description: Minimal response when no additional information is provided.
